mapper.select: select a.userId, a.draftId, a.order, a.status, u.name as userName, u.profileImage, u.position from approvals as a join users as u on a.userId = u.id where draftId = #{draftId}
mapper.insert: insert into approval_log (approvalId, action, draftId, approvalTime , reason) values (#{approvalId}, #{action}, #{draftId}, now() , #{reason})
mapper.select: SELECT al.approvalId, al.draftId, al.action, al.approvalTime, a.`order`, al.reason FROM approval_log al JOIN approvals a ON al.approvalId = a.userId AND al.draftId = a.draftId WHERE al.draftId = #{draftId};
